John 3:16.verse: For *God* so loved the *world*, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

methods.context: Gen 1:1, In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
methods.opposites: The opposite of God is nothing.

methods.context: 1 John 2:15-17, Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world.
methods.opposites: The opposite of the world without form, and void.

John 3:17.verse: For *God* sent not his Son into the *world* to condemn the world; but that the world through him might be saved.

methods.context: Gen 1:1, In the beginning God created the heaven and the earth.
methods.opposites: The opposite of God is nothing.

methods.context: 1 John 2:15-17, Love not the world, neither the things that are in the world.
methods.opposites: The opposite of the world without form, and void.
